results.title: Pig too far gone
results.brief_description: Chief Kosher is having a hard time busting open a crime ring and nabbing the King Pin, when the cops he sends undercover find it impossible to go unnoticed. His only option is to send in loose-cannon McBurger, which could be his best or worst decision to date.

results.title: Paranoid
results.brief_description: Year nine students Dexy and Sam are already auteurs in the suburban shlock/horror genre. In this thilling chase through the streets of Melbourne city our unsuspecting hero realises that a mysterious and terrifying figure is following him.

results.title: The Music box
results.creator_credit: Barbara Tilley, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Barbara Tilley’s moving story starts with how she and her brother moved in with her older sister, Marge, to avoid being sent to a home. Ever since that moment, Marge has been the family rock, the one keeping everyone strong through the changes and sadness and keeping the family’s spirit alive.
